label: A2B_tP30_85_ab2g_cg-001
title: $\alpha$-SrBr$_{2}$ Structure
comments:
(Hermann, 1943) originally assigned SrBr$_{2}$ to space group $Pnma$ \#62, and gave it the \href{current_web_home_dir/A2B_oP12_62_2c_c-010}{{\em Strukturbericht} designation $C53$}.  Subsequent investigation showed that the structure should be in space group $P4/n$ \#85, but this structure was never given a {\em Strukturbericht} symbol, although (Parth\'{e}) does list it as $C53$. 
 This compound can also be found as $\beta$-SrBr$_{2}$ in the  \href{current_web_home_dir/AB2_cF12_225_a_c-001}{fluorite ($C1$) structure}.
